doc.title: Nneɛma a ɛsakra ne nea ɛyɛ adwuma a ɛwɔ hɔ
doc.click: : URL adeɛ a ɛwɔ link a wɔakliki no mu
doc.page: : URL ade a ɛwɔ wɛb krataafa a ɛwɔ hɔ mprempren no mu (mpɛn pii no address bar), nnianim asɛm a ɛkɔ akyiri Hwɛ
doc.pageHost: : Domain din a ɛwɔ wɛbsaet krataafa a ɛwɔ hɔ mprempren no so
doc.clickpath: : Ɔkwan a link a wɔakliki no fa so
doc.isSameDomain: : Sɛ ɛyɛ domain din koro no ara a, {{tt}} yɛ yiw, {{ff}} yɛ dabi.
doc.isSameSubDomain: {{ss}}: Domain din koro no ara Hyɛ no nsow sɛ ɛwom sɛ domain din titiriw a ɛwɔ {{yy}} ne {{ff}} nyinaa yɛ {{mm}} de, nanso sub-domain din no yɛ {{ww}} ne {{ffss}} sɛnea ɛte biara. Enti wɔn domain din no yɛ soronko.
doc.isSameParent: : Sɛ ɛyɛ ɔwofo kwan koro no ara a, {{tt}} yɛ yiw, {{ff}} yɛ dabi.
doc.isPageSublink: : Sɛ́ ebia krataafa a ɛwɔ hɔ mprempren no yɛ kratafa ketewa a ɛwɔ link a wɔakliki no mu a, {{tt}} yɛ yiw, {{ff}} yɛ dabi.
doc.isPageMultilevelSublink: : Sɛ́ ebia krataafa a ɛwɔ hɔ mprempren no yɛ kratafa ketewa a enni ano wɔ link a wɔakliki no mu a, {{tt}} yɛ yiw, {{ff}} yɛ dabi.
doc.isClickSublink: : Sɛ ebia link a wɔakliki no yɛ kratafa a ɛwɔ hɔ mprempren no sub-link a, {{tt}} yɛ yiw, {{ff}} yɛ dabi.
doc.isClickMultilevelSublink: : Sɛ ebia link a wɔakliki no yɛ krataafa a ɛwɔ hɔ mprempren no sub-link a anohyeto nni mu a, {{tt}} yɛ yiw, {{ff}} yɛ dabi.

returnVariables.title: Nsakrae a wotumi san de ba

window.title: mpoma
window.externalBrowser: :Abɔnten brawsa (te sɛ {{tt}}, ne nea ɛkeka ho)

tab.title: tab krataafa no
tab.rightTab: : Link no bebue wɔ tab foforo bi mu wɔ nifa so
tab.leftTab: : Link no bebue wɔ tab foforo bi mu wɔ benkum so

functions.title: Dwumadi nneɛma a ɛwɔ hɔ
functions.minimatch: : {{gg}} kwan a ɛne ne ho hyia no de {{mm}} nhomakorabea di dwuma Yɛsrɛ wo hwɛ Hwɛ ma ɔkwan a wɔfa so de di dwuma, anaa wubetumi nso ahwehwɛ ɔkwan a wɔfa so de di dwuma a {{gg}}.
